“RESOLVED THAT putsuant to the provisions of Section 139 and other applicable
provisions, if any, of the Companies Act, 2013, read with rules made there under, M/s
Mallya & Mallya Chartered Accountants, having office at 29/2, 1st Floor Parijatha Complex,
Race Course Road, Bangalore — 560 001 (Firm Registration No: 0019558), is hereby
appointed for a term of 5 years from the conclusion of Sixth Annual General Meeting to
Eleventh Annual General Meeting of the Company and the remuneration payable shall be as
may be agreed upon between the Board of Ditectors and Auditors in addition to the
reimbursement of GST and actual out of pocket expenses incurred in relation with the audit
of accounts of the Company.”
